description: This exceptional 3 bed, 2.5 bath TH at 'Format' by Cressey offers 1,451 sq. ft. of contemporary living space w/ a stunning rooftop terrace overlooking beautiful City & Mountain VIEWS! Ideal for entertaining, features include brushed white oak flooring, bespoke matte black kitchen millwork, integrated Fulgor Milano appliances, A/C and radiant heated bathroom flooring. One of the most prime situated townhomes in the strata, West facing with natural light day to night & evening sunsets! Detached from the 16 story tower w/ street level access, this home offers privacy & quiet. Oversized windows overlook a quaint, tree-lined street w/ ample additional street parking. Premium amenities incl: fitness centre, workshop, co-working spaces & incredible rooftop terrace w/ 360 views, BBQs + playground.
